mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_NOTICE A
A.NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
A.NOTICE_BODY LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_CREATED_DATE , A.NOTICE_COUNT , A.NOTICE_WRITER_NO , E.NICKNAME , A.NOTICE_STATUS , A.NOTICE_DELETE_DATE , A.NOTICE_MODIFIED_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.NOTICE_NO , B.NOTICE_TITLE , B.NOTICE_BODY , B.NOTICE_CREATED_DATE , B.NOTICE_COUNT , B.NOTICE_WRITER_NO , B.NOTICE_STATUS , B.NOTICE_DELETE_DATE , B.NOTICE_MODIFIED_DATE FROM(SELECT C.NOTICE_NO , C.NOTICE_TITLE , C.NOTICE_BODY , C.NOTICE_CREATED_DATE , C.NOTICE_COUNT , C.NOTICE_WRITER_NO , C.NOTICE_STATUS , C.NOTICE_DELETE_DATE , C.NOTICE_MODIFIED_DATE FROM TBL_NOTICE C
JOIN TBL_MEMBER D ON(C.NOTICE_WRITER_NO == D.MEMBER_NO)
D.NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
C.NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
C.NOTICE_BODY LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND C.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
ORDER BY C.NOTICE_NO DESC ) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ endRow }
) A JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON(A.NOTICE_WRITER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.RNUM >= #{ startRow } ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_NOTICE A SET A.NOTICE_COUNT = A.NOTICE_COUNT + 1 WHERE A.NOTICE_NO = #{ no }
mapper.select: SELECT A.NOTICE_NO , A.NOTICE_TITLE , A.NOTICE_BODY , A.NOTICE_CREATED_DATE , A.NOTICE_COUNT , B.MEMBER_NO , B.NICKNAME FROM TBL_NOTICE A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.NOTICE_WRITER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.NOTICE_NO = #{ no }

JOIN TBL_BOARD_CATEGORY D ON(C.CATEGORY_NO = D.CATEGORY_NO)
D.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
C.QNA_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
C.QNA_BODY LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND C.QNA_STATUS = 'Y'
ORDER BY C.QNA_NO DESC ) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ endRow }
) A JOIN TBL_BOARD_CATEGORY D ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = D.CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON(A.ADMIN_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.RNUM >= #{ startRow } ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT A.REVIEW_NO , D.ATTACHED_FILE_EX , D.ATTACHED_FILE_THUMBNAIL , A.REVIEW_TITLE , A.REVIEW_BODY , A.REVIEW_COUNT , A.REVIEW_CREATED_DATE , A.MEMBER_NO , E.NICKNAME , A.REVIEW_STATUS , A.ORDER_CODE , A.RATING FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.REVIEW_NO , B.REVIEW_TITLE , B.REVIEW_BODY , B.REVIEW_COUNT , B.REVIEW_CREATED_DATE , B.MEMBER_NO , B.REVIEW_STATUS , B.ORDER_CODE , B.RATING FROM(SELECT C.REVIEW_NO , C.REVIEW_TITLE , C.REVIEW_BODY , C.REVIEW_COUNT , C.REVIEW_CREATED_DATE , C.MEMBER_NO , C.REVIEW_STATUS , C.ORDER_CODE , C.RATING FROM TBL_REVIEW C
C.REVIEW_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
C.REVIEW_BODY LIKE '%' || #{ searchValue } || '%'
AND C.REVIEW_STATUS = 'Y'
ORDER BY C.REVIEW_NO DESC ) B
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{ endRow }
) A JOIN ATTACHED_FILE D ON(A.REVIEW_NO = D.REVIEW_NO) JOIN TBL_MEMBER E ON(A.MEMBER_NO = E.MEMBER_NO) JOIN TBL_ORDER F ON(A.ORDER_CODE = F.ORDER_CODE) WHERE A.RNUM >= #{ startRow } ORDER BY 1 DESC
